Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Western
ShortDescription: Westbound 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, California and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, California and 63rd: due to, street blockage near 63rd/Western.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Octavia
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Harlem, Addison, Cumberland and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Octavia.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Harlem, Addison, Cumberland and Belmont: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Octavia.

Headline: Green Line Trains bypassing Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running, but not stopping at Garfield due to police activity.

Shuttle busses have been requested from Roosevelt to 63rd/Cottage and 63rd Ashland to provide connecting service through the affected area. At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
